General.Name: Shenzhen Wongtee International Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Wongtee International Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates in real estate industry in China. The company invests in and operates commercial real estate properties, such as office buildings, shopping centers, hotels, industrial parks, tourist attractions, cultural and creative parks, and other properties. It also provides asset management, brand incubation investment, Internet big data, financing, and intelligent integrated development services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen International Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Wongtee International Enterprise Co., Ltd. in September 2015. Shenzhen Wongtee International Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

3.Name: Mr. Bin  Yang
3.Title: Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
